Class playn.core.gl.GLContext

Added Methods
GLShader createQuadShader()  
int epoch() Returns the current GL context epoch.
void incrementEpoch() Increments our GL context epoch.
void popFramebuffer() Pops the framebuffer pushed by a previous call to .pushFramebuffer and restores the framebuffer that was active prior to that call.
void pushFramebuffer(int, int, int) Stores the metadata for the currently bound frame buffer, and binds the supplied framebuffer.
